name: Milkshake Design
description:
Since 2002 our focus has been to produce high quality and cost effective services whilst keeping our clients informed at each step of work undertaken. This has lead to us meeting and in most cases exceeding client specifications, ensuring you get what you need, when you need it.
Our staff have been involved with computers and programming since the early 1980′s with involvement in the internet, web site production and online applications since 1995 and have participated in projects for such prestigious clients as Manchester Museum of Science and Industry, Disney Interactive, Club 18-30, Abbey National, Astra Zeneca, BNFL, Roche pharmaceutical’s, Novartis AG and more recently Oldham Coliseum, Pan European Networks and a series of major firms of solicitors. Each member of our team is well versed in web site creation, graphic design, computer programming, hardware setup and maintenance as well as Microsoft operating systems and Office Suites. Each member of our staff brings their own talents and knowledge to our web creations, computer services and other works.
